# Unity generated folders
[Libraries to ignore]
[Libraries to ignore]
Temp/
Obj/
UnityGenerated/
Library/
Logs/
MemoryCaptures/
MemoryCapturesRaw/

# User-specific files
UserSettings/
*.user
*.userprefs
*.suo
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Crash Reports
sysinfo.txt

# Auto-generated project files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.vcxproj
*.vcxproj.filters

# Builds
Build/
Builds/
ExportedObj/
*.apk
*.aab
*.xcodeproj
*.xcworkspace
*.gradle
*.jar

# Rider / JetBrains IDE files
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# OS generated
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
desktop.ini

# Logs
*.log

# Packaging
*.unitypackage

# Backup & autosave
*.autosave

# Plastic SCM
.plastic/
ignore.conf
